projectCategory: ICSE Class IX Java Project Work (BlueJ)
subject: Java Programming

projects.title: Print First N Natural Numbers
projects.description: Accept a number N and print the first N natural numbers starting from 1.
projects.answer:
for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	System.out.print(i+" ");
projects.learningOutcome: Understand basic loop syntax and sequential execution.

projects.title: Sum of First N Natural Numbers
projects.description: Accept a number N and calculate the sum of all natural numbers from 1 to N.
projects.learningOutcome: Learn how accumulation works inside loops.

projects.title: Multiplication Table Generator
projects.description: Accept a number and generate its multiplication table up to 10.
projects.answer:
for(int i=1;i<=10;i++)
	System.out.println(n+" x "+i+" = "+(n*i));
projects.learningOutcome: Apply loop repetition to generate tables.

projects.title: Count Digits of a Number
projects.description: Accept a number and count how many digits are present in it.

projects.title: Sum of Digits of a Number
projects.description: Accept a number and find the sum of all its digits.

projects.title: Reverse a Number
projects.description: Accept a number and reverse its digits.
projects.learningOutcome: Strengthen loop logic and digit manipulation.

projects.title: Palindrome Number Checker
projects.description: Accept a number and check whether it is a palindrome.

projects.title: Factorial Calculator
projects.description: Accept a number and calculate its factorial.

projects.title: Count Factors of a Number
projects.description: Accept a number and count how many factors it has.

projects.title: Prime Number Checker
projects.description: Accept a number and check whether it is a prime number by testing factors only up to its square root.
projects.learningOutcome: Optimise loops using mathematical bounds and break statements.

projects.title: Print Numbers Divisible by 3
projects.description: Accept a number N and print all numbers between 1 and N which are divisible by 3.

projects.title: Sum of Numbers Divisible by 3
projects.description: Accept a number N and calculate the sum of all numbers between 1 and N that are divisible by 3.

projects.title: Print First N Multiples of a Number
projects.description: Accept two numbers m and n and print the first n multiples of m.
projects.answer:
for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	System.out.print((m*i)+" ");

projects.title: Sum of First N Multiples
projects.description: Accept two numbers m and n and find the sum of the first n multiples of m.

projects.title: Count Even Numbers Between 1 and N
projects.description: Accept a number N and count how many even numbers exist between 1 and N.

projects.title: Count Odd Numbers Between 1 and N
projects.description: Accept a number N and count how many odd numbers exist between 1 and N.

projects.title: Find Sum of Even Numbers Between 1 and N
projects.description: Accept a number N and calculate the sum of all even numbers between 1 and N.

projects.title: Find Sum of Odd Numbers Between 1 and N
projects.description: Accept a number N and calculate the sum of all odd numbers between 1 and N.

projects.title: Print Squares of Numbers
projects.description: Accept a number N and print the square of each number from 1 to N.
projects.answer:
for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	System.out.print((i*i)+" ");

projects.title: Find Sum of Squares
projects.description: Accept a number N and calculate the sum of squares of numbers from 1 to N.

projects.title: Print Cubes of Numbers
projects.description: Accept a number N and print the cube of each number from 1 to N.
projects.answer:
for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	System.out.print((i*i*i)+" ");

projects.title: Check Strong Number
projects.description: A number is called a Strong Number if the sum of the factorials of its digits is equal to the number itself. Accept a number and check whether it is a Strong Number.
projects.learningOutcome: Understand nested loops using digit processing.

projects.title: Print Factors of a Number
projects.description: Accept a number and print all its factors.

projects.title: Check Composite Number
projects.description: Accept a number and check whether it is a composite number.
projects.learningOutcome: Differentiate between prime and composite numbers.

projects.title: Generate Fibonacci Series
projects.description: Accept a number N and generate the first N terms of the Fibonacci series.

projects.title: Find Greatest Digit
projects.description: Accept a number and find the greatest digit present in it.

projects.title: Find Smallest Digit
projects.description: Accept a number and find the smallest digit present in it.

projects.title: Count Prime Numbers up to N
projects.description: Accept a number N and count how many prime numbers exist between 1 and N.

projects.title: Check Duck Number
projects.description: A Duck Number is a number which contains at least one zero but does not start with zero. Accept a number and check whether it is a Duck Number.

projects.title: Loop Execution Counter
projects.description: Accept a number N and count how many times a loop executes from 1 to N.

projects.title: Sum of Squares
projects.description: Accept a number N and calculate the sum of squares of all numbers from 1 to N.

projects.title: Count Numbers Divisible by 5
projects.description: Accept a number N and count how many numbers between 1 and N are divisible by 5.

projects.title: Find Product of Digits
projects.description: Accept a number and find the product of all its digits.

projects.title: Print Numbers in Reverse
projects.description: Accept a number N and print numbers from N down to 1.
projects.answer:
for(int i=n;i>=1;i--)
	System.out.print(i+" ");

projects.title: Check Harshad Number
projects.description: A Harshad Number is a number divisible by the sum of its digits. Accept a number and check whether it is a Harshad Number.

projects.title: Print First N Odd Numbers
projects.description: Accept a number N and print the first N odd numbers.

projects.title: Print First N Even Numbers
projects.description: Accept a number N and print the first N even numbers.

projects.title: Count Digits from 1 to N
projects.description: Accept a number N and count the total digits required to write all numbers from 1 to N.
projects.learningOutcome: Apply nested loops for range analysis.

projects.title: Print Two Digit Numbers
projects.description: Accept a number N and print all two digit numbers up to N.
projects.answer:
for(int i=10;i<=n && i<=99;i++)
	System.out.print(i+" ");

projects.title: Sum of Prime Numbers
projects.description: Accept a number N and calculate the sum of all prime numbers between 1 and N.
projects.learningOutcome: Combine nested loops with conditional summation.

projects.title: Fibonacci Series
projects.description: Accept a number N and generate the Fibonacci series up to N terms.

projects.title: Factorial Series
projects.description: Accept a number N and print the factorial of numbers from 1 to N.

projects.title: Square Series
projects.description: Accept a number N and print square of each number from 1 to N.
projects.answer:
for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	System.out.print((i*i)+" ");

projects.title: Cube Series
projects.description: Accept a number N and print cube of each number from 1 to N.
projects.answer:
for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	System.out.print((i*i*i)+" ");

projects.title: Sum of Even Series
projects.description: Accept a number N and calculate the sum of the first N even numbers.

projects.title: Sum of Odd Series
projects.description: Accept a number N and calculate the sum of the first N odd numbers.

projects.title: Series: 1, 11, 111
projects.description: Accept a number N and generate the series 1, 11, 111 upto N terms.

projects.title: Alternate Squares
projects.description: Accept a number N and print squares of alternate numbers starting from 1.
projects.answer:
for(int i=1;i<=n;i+=2)
	System.out.print((i*i)+" ");

projects.title: Multiples of 7
projects.description: Accept a number N and print the first N multiples of 7.
projects.answer:
for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	System.out.print((7*i)+" ");

projects.title: Harmonic Series
projects.description: The Harmonic Series is defined as: 1 + 1/2 + 1/3 + 1/4 + ... + 1/N. Write a program to accept a number N and calculate the sum of the harmonic series up to N terms.
projects.learningOutcome: Understand floating point division and cumulative summation.

projects.title: Square Star Pattern
projects.description: Accept a number N and print a square star pattern of size N x N.
projects.learningOutcome: Understand nested loops for pattern printing.

projects.title: Right Triangle Pattern
projects.description: Accept a number N and print a right angled triangle star pattern.

projects.title: Inverted Right Triangle
projects.description: Accept a number N and print an inverted right angled triangle pattern.

projects.title: Number Triangle
projects.description: Accept a number N and print a number triangle pattern.

projects.title: Same Number Rows
projects.description: Accept a number N and print same numbers in each row.

projects.title: Floyd Triangle
projects.description: Accept a number N and print Floyd's triangle.
projects.learningOutcome: Use external counter in nested loops.

projects.title: Reverse Number Triangle
projects.description: Accept a number N and print reverse number triangle pattern.

projects.title: Star Pyramid
projects.description: Accept a number N and print a centered star pyramid.

projects.title: Inverted Pyramid
projects.description: Accept a number N and print an inverted star pyramid.

projects.title: Hollow Square
projects.description: Accept a number N and print a hollow square star pattern.
